testcase.name: Kullanici, API kullanarak ulkeleri dogrular
testcase.system-out: Given Kullanici set the Base Url............................................passed And Send the GET request and get the response...............................passed And Set the expected data...................................................passed Then Make validation........................................................passed

testcase.name: Kullanici, API kullanarak ulkeleri gunceller
testcase.system-out: Given Kullanici, ulke guncellemesi icin beklenen verileri girer.............passed And Kullanici, ulke guncellemesi icin istek gonderir ve yanit alir..........passed And Kullanici, ulke guncellemesi icin tum API bilgilerini kaydeder..........passed Then Kullanici, ulke guncellemesi icin API kayitlarini dogrular.............passed

testcase.name: Kullanici, API kullanarak sehirleri dogrular
testcase.system-out: Given Kullanici Base Url i olusturur........................................passed And Kullanici post istegini gonderir ve yanitini alir.......................passed Then Kullanici APi kayitlarini dogrular.....................................passed
